Class ResourceDAO

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.model.resource.ResourceDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Resource>
public class ResourceDAO extends Object implements DAO<Resource>
Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for the Resource entity. Provides methods to perform CRUD operations on the Resources table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ResourceDAO()
    Constructs a new ResourceDAO using the default DatabaseManager instance from the main application.
    ResourceDAO(DatabaseManager dbManager)
    Constructs a new ResourceDAO with a specified DatabaseManager.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public Integer insert(Resource resource)
      Inserts a new resource into the database. Supports both general resources and multimedia resources.
      Specified by:
      insert in interface DAO<Resource>
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to insert
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly inserted resource
      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the insertion fails

    • updateById

      public void updateById(Resource resource, int trackID)
      Updates an existing resource identified by its ID (trackID here seems like a misnomer, should be resource ID).
      Specified by:
      updateById in interface DAO<Resource>
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource with updated data
      trackID - the ID of the resource to update (note: parameter name is misleading, expected resource ID)
      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the update fails

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(int id)
      Deletes a resource by its ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface DAO<Resource>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the resource to delete
      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the deletion fails

    • getById

      public Resource getById(int id)
      Retrieves a resource by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getById in interface DAO<Resource>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the resource
      Returns:
      the Resource object, or null if not found

    • getAll

      public List<Resource> getAll()
      Retrieves all resources.
      Specified by:
      getAll in interface DAO<Resource>
      Returns:
      a list of all Resource objects in the database

    • getAllByUserID

      public List<Resource> getAllByUserID(int userId)
      Retrieves all resources belonging to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      a list of Resource objects owned by the user

    • getAllByTrackID

      public List<Resource> getAllByTrackID(int trackId)
      Retrieves all resources linked to a specific track.
      Parameters:
      trackId - the track ID
      Returns:
      a list of Resource objects linked to the track

    • getAllCommentedResourcesByUserID

      public List<Resource> getAllCommentedResourcesByUserID(int userId)
      Retrieves the last 5 distinct resources commented on by a specific user, ordered by comment creation date descending.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID who made the comments
      Returns:
      a list of commented Resource objects

    • mapResultSetToEntity

      public static Resource mapResultSetToEntity(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Maps a ResultSet row to a Resource or MultimediaResource entity.
      Parameters:
      rs - the ResultSet positioned at the current row
      Returns:
      the mapped Resource object
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
